feature1.explanation: Both texts use quotation marks for direct speech.

feature2.explanation: Text 1 uses more informal language and direct speech, while Text 2 is more formal and rule-oriented.

feature3.explanation: Text 1 has shorter, more direct sentences compared to the longer, more structured sentences in Text 2.

feature4.explanation: Text 1 conveys a critical and confrontational tone, whereas Text 2 is instructive and formal.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the mix of informal vs. formal language, sentence structure, and tone differences, the overall confidence that the two texts were written by the same author is moderate.
